descriptionHtml:
A save that I made that took a while.

This is my 2nd release.

Background Story:
Chrever grew up in Riften. His parents were Stormcloaks. Everyone yelled at him. His parents
didn\'t like him. As a teen he got into a lot of fights with his parents. One time they threatened
to kill him. Finally he was old enough to move out. He found out he was dragonborn. After that
He joined the Imperials and took over Windhelm and got revenge on his mother and father.
Now he is an Imperial spy. 


 Mods used:
